item.description:
Hi everyone,

Kind of a spntaneous decision, but I wanted to open up my house to kick off the nice weather on this holiday weekend. If you don't have plans and would like to hang out in Nahant with some fellow heathens on Sunday, please join me!

Carpooling is probably the easiest way to arrive but the train also heads to Lynn which is a 5 minute drive from my house.

Beer, snacks and all contributions are welcome!

I hope to see some of you soon...

Julie
item.how_to_find_us: I will be on the porch!
item.name: Nahant holiday weekend barbecue!
